message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $100 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
I understand that $90 is a bit of a stretch for me, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now willing to offer $105. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
I understand that $95 is still a bit above my target, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to offer $100. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $100, Bob. I've already made several concessions, and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $92 and $100, so I'll offer you $96. This is my final offer.
